## Description
Brief description of the changes made to the LiftDesign format specification.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)  
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Format specification update

## Changes Made
- [ ] Updated XML schema/structure
- [ ] Modified README documentation
- [ ] Added new properties/elements
- [ ] Removed deprecated features
- [ ] Updated example files

## Testing
- [ ] XML example validates against specification
- [ ] Documentation is clear and accurate
- [ ] Breaking changes are clearly documented

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added examples that demonstrate the change

## Additional Notes
Any additional information, concerns, or considerations for reviewers.
